include(ExternalProject)

set(OPENSSL_BUILD_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../download/Tongsuo-8.3.3/build")
set(OPENSSL_FETCHED_DIR "${OPENSSL_BUILD_DIR}/lib")

set(FETCHED_OPENSSL_LIBS
        "${OPENSSL_FETCHED_DIR}/libssl${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX}"
        "${OPENSSL_FETCHED_DIR}/libcrypto${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX}"
        )

message(STATUS "FETCHED OPENSSL LIBS ${FETCHED_OPENSSL_LIBS}")

set_target_properties(
        openssl_external
        PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_DIRECTORIES
        "${OPENSSL_FETCHED_DIR}/"
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES
        "${OPENSSL_BUILD_DIR}/include"
        IMPORTED_LOCATION_LIBS
        "${FETCHED_OPENSSL_LIBS}")


message(STATUS "INSTALL_DIRECTORIES ${INSTALL_DIRECTORIES}")
message(STATUS "INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES}")
message(STATUS "IMPORTED_LOCATION_LIBS ${IMPORTED_LOCATION_LIBS}")
